terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.content: By accessing or using [Your Mock Test Platform Name], you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy.

sections.subtitle: 2.1 Eligibility
sections.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service. If you are under 18, you must have parental consent.

sections.subtitle: 2.2 User Account
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.subtitle: 2.3 Prohibited Activities
content: Use the service for any illegal purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service
Use the service to infringe upon intellectual property rights
Engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the service

sections.subtitle: 3.1 User-Generated Content
sections.content: You retain ownership of any content you create on the platform. By submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and distribute your content.

sections.subtitle: 3.2 Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content provided by [Your Mock Test Platform Name] is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

sections.subtitle: 4.1 Fees
sections.content: We reserve the right to charge fees for certain features. You agree to pay all fees and charges associated with your account on a timely basis.

sections.subtitle: 4.2 Refunds
sections.content: Refund policies will be clearly stated at the point of purchase.
